I really don’t know who the last person was. Just work it out using the tools you’ve got.

I understand your frustration, but unfortunately the tools I have available don't include any way to determine messaging history or when you last contacted someone. The contact search function only provides static information like names, phone numbers, and relationships - it doesn't have access to communication timestamps or message logs.

The available tools are:
- Contact search/add/modify functions (but no message history)
- Timestamp utilities (but no access to your message data)
- Unit conversion

Without access to your messaging history or communication logs, there's no way for me to determine which contact you messaged most recently using the available tools.
